msbt.message: HAR! Ye saved me feathery hide! I owe ye me life, so I'm sendin' over a bit o' me booty. Rememberâ€” though we may be far apart, we're always connected by the open sea. Ugh! Ye got me soundin' all mushy!

At last, I'm reunited with me crew! These sea dogs would surely be sunk without their beloved captain. I've sent ye some pirate booty as a reward. Promise you'll gaze at it often and spare a thought for me!
We did it, skipper! We beat the briny deep! I'm back on me ship, and the jolly is back in me roger. A good captain repays his debts, so here's a bit o' booty. Keep an unpatched eye on it for me! HAR!
Arr, it's good to be reunited with these mangy scalawags I call me crew. Since ye saved me scraggly neck, I want ye to have a special reward. It's the bootiest of all me pirate booty! HAR!
Thanks to ye, I'm back to sailin' with me buccaneer buddies. As a reward, this rare pirate booty is all yours. I also promise not to pillage yer fair isle o' ... even though I really want to! HAR!
